skillTree.localised_description: The god of money, wealth and power protects it's patrons with a shield of coins.
Under the cover of his flamboyance, this dashing Captain hides a more serious layer. As he too often seen entering the Lothern Embassy in the Elfsgemeente.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +15% for alliances with High Elves

Melee defence: +8 for High Elf units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: No waters uncharted, no river not crossed - Maicross can sail you anywhere on any map.

effects.description:
Cost of Caravan Shortcut event: -20%
	(accompanying Lord)

Chance of a double move: +20%
	(accompanying Lord)

skillTree.localised_description: He is infamous in taverns from Port Reaver to Beichai, Captain Daefvid is one of those adventurers bards sing their tales about. Or so he expects.
None has the verbal and retorical skill to tell the story of the Savonarola as Maefcross, a story of riches lost on a unfindable island, yet ripe for the taking for those who know where to look.
Asurian cuisance is otherwordly, and a very effective way to keep morale high. It has made Daefvid a welcome sight to any crew he sailed with.
A board the Black Dove Captain Maicross would often tighten the knots himself, trusting his abilities to shore up even a crashed Landship with a few simple knots.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Immune to High Seas, Reef and Storm attrition
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Spellcasters can oft-sense when magic is close or being drawn from the Winds.

effects.description: Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 5%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 10%
Scouting action: Magic item drop chance is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: "I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

items.colour_text: Insatiably curious, over the last few years he has become the biggest information broker in Marienburg, with contacts at all levels of society. For a price, a buyer can find almost anything out. For a higher price, Trancas will try to find something out if he doesn't already know it. His abiding goal is to destroy a ring of child-snatchers whose activities he has traced for years through the Reik Valley and northern Bretonnia. He is convinced the gang is based in Marienburg, but he has yet to find any solid leads.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 when fighting against Wood Elves
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Daefvid originally hails from the mysterious Isle of Aeryn, where the finest Sailors among Elves are raised.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 when fighting at sea
	(Hero's army)
